name: Galactic Civilizations II: Twilight of the Arnor
name_original: Galactic Civilizations II: Twilight of the Arnor
description:
Galactic Civilizations II: Twilight of the Arnor is a strategy game developed by Stardock Entertainment. It came out on 30-04-2008. Stardock Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Galactic Civilizations II: Twilight of the Arnor on PC.
